calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.dialog: Click here to dialog a calendar to choose the date from
calendar.about:
DHTML Date/Time Selector
(c) dynarch.com 2002-2005 / Author: Mihai Bazon
For latest version visit: http://www.dynarch.com/projects/calendar/
      Distributed under GNU LGPL.  See http://gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html for details.

 Date selection:
 - Use the « » buttons to select year
 - Use the < >  buttons to select month
 - Hold mouse button on any of the above buttons for faster selection.;
calendar.about.time:
Time selection:
 - Click on any of the time parts to increase it
 - or Shift-click to decrease it
 - or click and drag for faster selection.
login.text:
Please enter your username and password below and click the Login button to continue.
If you have reached this page unexpectedly, your session has expired and you need to re-login to the system.
login.title: Please Log-In
login.error.role:
Your username/password combination is valid.
However, it appears that you are missing a necessary role required to fully authenticate to this application.
login.error: Login failed, please try again or register as a new user.
login.howto.title: How to login
login.howto: If you are a registered user you simply enter your user name and password and click on the submit button. In case this is your first time, you should register yourself to the system.
login.na: This feature is not available yet
